description:
Light enough for long climbs, strong enough to withstand serious pedaling power, and dependable enough for endurance and adventure riding. The Candy 1 is the lightest of the pack and uses lighter duty composite in the body of the pedal.

  • Designed for cyclocross, xc, trail and all-mountain riding
  • Body is composite material
  • Wing is stamped steel
  • Spindle is chromoly
  • Double-lip internal seal and external seal keep out water and debris to extend pedal life
  • Igus LL-glide bearings perform in adverse conditions
  • Enduro cartridge bearing has great corrosion resistance and superior tolerance
  • Includes premium brass cleats with shims
  • Release angle is 15 or 20 degrees
name: Crankbrothers Candy 1 Pedals
